The rules and regulations of the sport are not clearly defined, leading to confusion and disputes among players.
The sport does not have a clear objective or goal, making it difficult for players to understand what they are working towards.
The sport is not inclusive, and not all players are able to participate due to physical or mental limitations.
The sport is not sustainable, and it is difficult to find players and resources to support it.
The sport does not have a clear and fair way to measure and compare the performance of players.
